content.text:
Let me analyze the two structures in the main target image and provide assembly instructions for both.

Left Structure Analysis:
- Has 7 blocks total
- 3 layers high
- Contains a red arch piece with orange roof pieces
- Has yellow base blocks
- Blue and green cubes on top level

Right Structure Analysis:
- Has 5 blocks total
- Features a red arch with orange roof
- Two green vertical supports
- One yellow horizontal bridge piece

Let me provide the assembly instructions for both structures:

Left Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 6 (yellow cube base left)
    Step2: Move block with index 6 (yellow cube base right)
    Step3: Move block with index 1 (red arch)
    Step4: Move block with index 3 (blue cube top)
    Step5: Move block with index 4 (green cube top)
    Step6: Move block with index 15 (orange roof left)
    Step7: Move block with index 16 (orange roof right)
}

Right Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 7 (green vertical support left)
    Step2: Move block with index 8 (green vertical support right)
    Step3: Move block with index 11 (yellow horizontal bridge)
    Step4: Move block with index 1 (red arch)
    Step5: Move block with index 13 (orange roof piece)
}

Each structure has been broken down into logical building steps, starting from the bottom and working up, ensuring stability during construction.
